long_description: Planning a trip to Italy in the cooler months? Be sure to bring along the Isis wool-blend Piazza sweater for women. It adds soft warmth and a touch of elegance to your sightseeing and cafe-hopping. Cotton/nylon/merino wool blend combines for softness, durability and warmth. Isis Piazza sweater features a durable Taslan liner that feels soft on exposed skin. Full center-front zipper runs up through neck for cozy protection. Cuffs have thumbholes for extra coverage and a roll-back sleeve detail for style. Closeout.
